text: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ حُرُمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦۗ وَأُحِلَّتۡ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ إِلَّا مَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَٱجۡتَنِبُواْ ٱلرِّجۡسَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَوۡثَٰنِ وَٱجۡتَنِبُواْ قَوۡلَ ٱلزُّورِ
translation: 30. Ama Cajji taamoomiy Yalli sinam kah amrisee kee wohuk kalah Yalli isi naqoosah madqe madqooqi yeynebeeh yessekexxee num, woo massakaxxaa is addunyaa kee akeeral kayrih kaah aysuk Raqta kay Rabbih xaqul, kaadu lacti cadóh makmo siinih calallowteh, Qhuraanal siinil tankirriyyimey carammotte akke waytek (barugaa kee wohuk kalah tanim kinnuk), numtinwwellittey Najaasak tanih qibaadák exxeera, kaadu dirab maxcóo kee dirab sumaaqak exxeera.
